name: Sculpting Brush
description: Experience sculpting perfection with this vegan synthetic makeup brush, meticulously crafted with densely packed bristles that are expertly cut at an angle. Its flat surface ensures precise control, allowing for a fast and flawless application every time.
descriptionHtml: Experience sculpting perfection with this vegan synthetic makeup brush, meticulously crafted with densely packed bristles that are expertly cut at an angle. Its flat surface ensures precise control, allowing for a fast and flawless application every time.

name: Winning Perfect 10 Foundation
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Perfect 10.jpg
description: Formulated with an unheard-of ten age-defying ingredients, including Apple Stem Cell Technology. This oil-free, color correcting, flawless, long-wearing liquid foundation is beautiful and highly beneficial for your skin. 'Perfect 10' contains Apple Stem Cells, Vitamins A, C, & E, Ceraminds, Co-Q-10, white tea, biotin, bisabolol, and phytosphingosine. This product will forever be your favorite liquid foundation.

name: Cream Contours - Timeless Face Sticks
description: Timeless Face Sticks fuses skincare and cosmetics to naturally sculpt and highlight your features. Formulated with anti-aging ingredients that work to hydrate, this creamy texture melts onto cheeks for a pop of buildable color.
descriptionHtml: Timeless Face Sticks fuses skincare and cosmetics to naturally sculpt and highlight your features. Formulated with anti-aging ingredients that work to hydrate, this creamy texture melts onto cheeks for a pop of buildable color.

name: BLOOM - Sheer Joy
description:
BLOOM - Light Pink blush shade.

Sheer Joy Blush is an age-defying formula that combines a light-to-medium coverage blush with a powerful serum. Packed with anti-aging and anti-inflammatory compounds, this tinted serum soothes skin while helping minimize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and other signs of aging. Potent moisturizers leave skin hydrated without clogging pores. This breathable formula doesn't have the heavy feel of a traditional makeup, making it suitable for acne-prone skin. Sheer Joy is a must-have for busy individuals who want to boost natural glow and fight aging in one easy step.

1 fl. oz. bottle

name: Alluring Perfect 10 Foundation
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Perfect 10.jpg
description:
perfect liquid foundation

Alluring - a light yellow undertone

Formulated with an unheard-of ten age-defying ingredients, including Apple Stem Cell Technology. This oil-free, color correcting, flawless, long-wearing liquid foundation is beautiful and highly beneficial for your skin. 'Perfect 10' contains Apple Stem Cells, Vitamins A, C, & E, Ceraminds, Co-Q-10, white tea, biotin, bisabolol, and phytosphingosine. This product will forever be your favorite liquid foundation.

.9 fl oz

Ingredients & Directions

Liquid Foundation formulated with 10 Ant-Aging Ingredients and Color Matching technology.
Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hexylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glycerin, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract (Apple Stem Cells), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Bisabolol, Ubiquinone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Biotin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Propylene Carbonate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Lecithin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, PEG-8, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Isopentyldiol, May Contain (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

Who Should Use Perfect 10

Perfect 10 liquid foundation is great for everyone.

name: Stunning - Perfect 10 Foundation
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Perfect 10.jpg
description:
perfect liquid foundation

Stunning- lightest shade with a neutral undertone

Formulated with an unheard-of ten age-defying ingredients, including Apple Stem Cell Technology. This oil-free, color correcting, flawless, long-wearing liquid foundation is beautiful and highly beneficial for your skin. 'Perfect 10' contains Apple Stem Cells, Vitamins A, C, & E, Ceraminds, Co-Q-10, white tea, biotin, bisabolol, and phytosphingosine. This product will forever be your favorite liquid foundation.

.9 fl oz

Ingredients & Directions

Liquid Foundation formulated with 10 Ant-Aging Ingredients and Color Matching technology.
Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hexylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glycerin, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract (Apple Stem Cells), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Bisabolol, Ubiquinone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Biotin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Propylene Carbonate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Lecithin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, PEG-8, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Isopentyldiol, May Contain (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

Who Should Use Perfect 10

Perfect 10 liquid foundation is great for eall skintypes.

name: Delight Perfect 10 Foundation
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Perfect 10.jpg
description:
Delight- lightest shade with a rosey undertone

What It Is

Perfect 10 is a buildable medium coverage liquid foundation. This foundation is packed with anti-aging ingredients that will leave your skin looking flawless and feeling flawless. Perfect 10’s formula is breathable and natural looking.

What It Does

We don’t believe in choosing between skincare or cosmetics. This foundation works to even out skin tone, hide imperfections, and nourish the skin with top of the line anti-aging ingredients. Perfect 10’s formula contains age-defying and hydrating ingredients such as Apple Stem Cells, Vitamins A, C, & E, Ceraminds, Co-Q-10, white tea, biotin, bisabolol, and phytosphingosine.

How To Use It

Apply Perfect 10 with your favorite brush, blending bomb or clean hands! Dot foundation over skin. Start at the center of the face and blend outward.

Who Should Use It

Perfect 10 is ideal for anyone looking to even out skin tone or hide imperfections. It can be used by those with normal, oily, dry, maturing, and combination skin. It's suitable for all ages.

.9 fl oz

Ingredients

Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hexylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glycerin, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract (Apple Stem Cells), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Bisabolol, Ubiquinone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Biotin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Propylene Carbonate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Lecithin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, PEG-8, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Isopentyldiol, May Contain (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

Who Should Use Perfect 10

Perfect 10 liquid foundation is great for eall skintypes.

descriptionHtml:
Dazzling - a light neutral to rosey undertone

What It Is

Perfect 10 is a buildable medium coverage liquid foundation. This foundation is packed with anti-aging ingredients that will leave your skin looking flawless and feeling flawless. Perfect 10’s formula is breathable and natural looking.

What It Does

We don’t believe in choosing between skincare or cosmetics. This foundation works to even out skin tone, hide imperfections, and nourish the skin with top of the line anti-aging ingredients.  Perfect 10’s formula contains age-defying and hydrating ingredients such as Apple Stem Cells, Vitamins A, C, & E, Ceraminds, Co-Q-10, white tea, biotin, bisabolol, and phytosphingosine.

How To Use It

Apply Perfect 10 with your favorite brush, blending bomb or clean hands! Dot foundation over skin. Start at the center of the face and blend outward.

Who Should Use It

Perfect 10 is ideal for anyone looking to even out skin tone or hide imperfections. It can be used by those with normal, oily, dry, maturing, and combination skin. It's suitable for all ages.


.9 fl oz

Ingredients & Directions

Liquid Foundation formulated with 10 Ant-Aging Ingredients and Color Matching technology.

Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hexylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glycerin, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract (Apple Stem Cells), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Bisabolol, Ubiquinone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Biotin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Propylene Carbonate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Lecithin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, PEG-8, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Isopentyldiol, May Contain (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

Who Should Use Perfect 10

Perfect 10 liquid foundation is great for everyone.

name: BLISS - Sheer Joy
description:
BLISS - Second lightest shade, comparable to Perfect 10 Foundation in the shade DAZZLING

Sheer Joy is an age-defying formula that combines a light-to-medium coverage foundation with a powerful serum. Packed with anti-aging and anti-inflammatory compounds, this tinted serum soothes skin while helping minimize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and other signs of aging. Potent moisturizers leave skin hydrated without clogging pores. This breathable formula doesn't have the heavy feel of a traditional foundation, making it suitable for acne-prone skin. Sheer Joy is a must-have for busy individuals who want to boost natural glow and fight aging in one easy step.

1 fl. oz. bottle
